Control's

Our game is a PC only game. Our controls are:

WASD - Vertical & Horizontal Movement

E - Interact/Pick-Up Items (Hold for Hacking/Opening Elevators)

P/Esc - Pause Game

 Narrative

The Lifter is a game about a Gym Bro Weightlifter named Gym Brody who when faced with financial difficulties as a result of his supplement and Steak & Oven Chips dependencies. 

Gym takes to shoplifting from jewellery stores, office spaces, and anywhere wherein valuables may lie - often taking the lift (elevator) to other floors in the same building.

Can Gym “Dude” Brody lift himself from his current struggles to the status of giga-chad? You decide.

Goal

steal as many valuables as possible and reach 300 Score before the elevator doors open
